lead_paragraph: Three teenagers suspected in the shooting deaths of two people at a homeless encampment are themselves homeless brothers.

headline.print_headline: National Briefing | Northwest; Washington: 3 Teenage Brothers Held in Killings at Homeless Camp
headline.main: Teenage Brothers Held in Killings at Seattle Homeless Camp

snippet: Three teenagers suspected in the shooting deaths of two people at a homeless encampment are themselves homeless brothers.
abstract: Seattle police arrest three brothers, ages 13, 16 and 17, in connection with shooting in downtown homeless encampment that resulted in two deaths and injured three people; police speculate shooting was provoked by low-level drug dispute and brothers will be held in custody until prosecutors decide on charges.
